Abhihaṭṭhuṁ，（= abhihantiṁ，ger. of abhiharati） 【獨】要去帶近來（Only in praise abhihaṭṭhuṁ pavāreti，to offer having fetched up）。
Abhihaṭṭhuṁ，[ger. of abhiharati]. Only in praise abhihaṭṭhuṁ pavāreti，to offer having fetched up. M. I.224； A.V，350，352； S.IV，190，V，53，300. See note in Vinaya Texts II.440. （Page 72）
